item.description:
Folks we're gonna go a-skeet-shootin' and a-drinkin' Saturday August 11 in Burlington. Note these will be separate activities (shoot first, drink later). This paid event. Great for beginners and for those more advanced to show off (safely).

Eyes/ears/ammos/guns/ammo/ins...truction included

IF YOU ARE GOING, PLEASE PAY $35 here ASAP:
http://tinyurl.com/libdrinksaug2012

IF YOU DO NOT PAY $35 YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO ATTEND.

Meet here:
Date/Time: Saturday August 11 @ 2pm
Where: The Minuteman Sportsman's Club
56 R Francis Wyman Road
Burlington, MA 01803
Tel: 781-272-7169
http://www.minutemansportsmen.com/index.html
Event Contact: Bill Batty 617-529-8601 skeet@battylaw.com

Post-event drinkin' and eatin' will be arranged at the Club.

Note the UN's July 27 push for global arms control:
http://www.washingtonpost.com/world/final-push-for-global-arms-trade-treaty-begins-at-united-nations/2012/07/03/gJQA9yI2KW_story.html
item.name: Liberty Drinks Boston goes Skeet Shootin & Boozin
